descriptor.name: Lightweight Puffer Jacket
descriptor.short_desc:
100% Original Products
Pay on delivery might be available
Easy 14 days returns and exchanges
Try & Buy might be available
descriptor.long_desc: Lightweight puffer jacket in a quilted weave with a hood and a discreet zip down the front with an anti-chafe chin guard. Long sleeves and pockets in the side seams with a concealed zip. Elasticated binding around the hood and at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.

descriptor.short_desc: "Comfortable and stylish Tshirts for all-day wear, perfect for expressing your unique personality."
descriptor.long_desc: "Experience unparalleled comfort and style with our premium T-shirts. Elevate your wardrobe with our versatile and trendy designs that effortlessly blend fashion and comfort."
